title: Stuffed meatloaf
ingredients: ['1 large carrot', '100g frozen spinach', '600g minced beef', '1 egg', '3 tablespoons dried breadcrumbs', '3 tablespoons grated Parmesan cheese', 'salt and pepper to taste', '3 slices of cooked prosciutto', '3 thin slices of Provolone cheese', '2 hard boiled eggs, peeled', '5 rashers of pancetta', '120ml white wine']
